Package cryptoTrader.dataStorage.brokerDatabase

Class BrokerData

java.lang.Object
cryptoTrader.dataStorage.brokerDatabase.BrokerData
All Implemented Interfaces:
UpdateBrokerData
public class BrokerData extends Object implements UpdateBrokerData
This class represents a Broker.
Author:
Yakup Tezcan, Wesley James Fortin, Reginald Pierre Harder, TSUNG-YING TSAI This class implements UpdataBrokerData as an interface. List data structure is used to store the data about the brokers.
